description: Dashboards for Redis managed by KubeBlocks

targets.expr: redis_mem_util * on (iid) group_right redis_up or (100 * (redis_memory_used_bytes / redis_memory_max_bytes))

panels.description: This metric will only be non-zero if the instance is a master
panels.title: Connected slaves by instance

panels.description: This metric is only exported if the instance is a slave.
panels.title: Time since last master connection
Key evictions per second per instance

panels.description: Hit rate shows the percentage of key space lookups that hit a key.
panels.title: Hit ratio per instance
Total Time Spent by Command / sec

title: Redis
